evidence: Clear modular structure with distinct packages: trackeval, trackeval.datasets, trackeval.metrics, trackeval.baselines
Each module has well-defined responsibilities (datasets handling, metrics calculation, evaluation logic)
Shared core module (trackeval) that other modules depend on
Scripts directory contains entry points that use the core modules
Average fan-out of 5.1 suggests moderate inter-module dependencies
Consistent use of __init__.py files indicating intentional module structure
Base classes (_BaseDataset, _BaseMetric) suggest inheritance-based extensibility within modules
risks: Some inter-module coupling evident in import patterns
Dataset and metric modules show tight coupling through shared data structures
Potential for circular dependencies as system grows
